title: Spaghetti with clams and chilli
description: This traditional Italian seafood pasta dish of clams with chilli, garlic and white wine is great for a date night recipe.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz small very fresh clams (ideally English surf clams but otherwise palourdes)
1 tsp flaked sea salt, plus extra to season
4 large garlic cloves, very finely sliced
1 large banana shallot or ½ medium onion, finely sliced
1 long red chilli, finely sliced or 1 tsp dried chilli flakes
25g/1oz bunch fresh flat leaf parsley, leaves chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
